products.name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
products.description: The Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite Tech Craft FG is designed for explosive speed on the pitch. The upper is made of premium leather for a comfortable fit and a soft touch on the ball. The lightweight soleplate provides traction and stability on firm ground surfaces.

products.name: Nike React Miler
products.description: The Nike React Miler is a running shoe that's designed to help you run faster and longer. It features a lightweight, breathable upper with Flywire cables for support. The React foam midsole provides responsive cushioning that lasts all day long. And the rubber outsole has a waffle pattern for traction on any surface.

products.name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37
products.description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37 is built for runners at every level. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or just starting out, this shoe will provide you with the comfort and support you need to go the distance. With a lightweight design and responsive cushioning, you'll be able to run faster and farther than ever before.

products.name: Nike Air Force 1
products.description: The Nike Air Force 1 is a classic basketball shoe that's been around since 1982. It features a leather upper, Air-Sole unit in the heel and rubber outsole for traction. This version of the shoe has an updated design with perforations on the side panels to help keep your feet cool during play.
